statements: DELETE FROM palm_vein_recognition_reports WHERE user_id = 100 AND report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM reports_on_palm_vein_accuracy WHERE report_id = 10 AND patient_id = 5;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 2 AND patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM user_details WHERE palm_vein_registered = false;
DELETE FROM palm_vein_recognition_accuracy WHERE user_id = 123 AND recognition_time <= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM users WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
